alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:25AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Miller, southwestern Lafayette and southwestern Columbia Counties, northwestern Webster, northwestern Caddo and northern Bossier Parishes, eastern Marion and southeastern Cass Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ida to near Rodessa to near McLeod to Smithland to 7 miles north of Karnack. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springhill, Vivian, Benton, Cullen, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Sarepta, Mooringsport, Hosston, Rodessa, Belcher, Ida, Gilliam, Smithland, McLeod, Welcome, Gray, Alden Bridge, Cavett and State Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
